'''Inquisitor Lödwyn''' is a character in {{poe2}}.  

## Background

Head of the Steel Garrote detachment at the [Oathbinder's Sanctum](/oathbindersSanctum/), the Inquisitor runs the Court of Woedica, trying would-be oathbreakers - or just those the cult considers oathbreakers, in keeping with the beliefs of Woedican faithful. The Inquisitor is a fanatic to the bone and attempts to reason with her are a forlorn hope for anybody who's not a member of the [Bleak Walkers](/bleakWalkers/).
